'''Heavy Brightwood Pottery Wheel''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Heavy Brightwood Pottery Wheel is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating a group of [[Fungi]] in [[Bayt Al-Muazzam]], [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Sumeru]].
